item.text: Samson went to Gaza. There he saw a prostitute and slept with her.

The <st data-num="05841" class="">Gazites</st> were <st data-num="0559" class="">told</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="08123" class="">Samson</st> has <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> <st data-num="02008" class="">here</st>!” So they <st data-num="05437" class="">surrounded</st> the town<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="0693" class="">hid</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="03915" class="">night</st> at the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st>, <st data-num="0693" class="">waiting</st> for him to leave.<n id="3" /> They <st data-num="02790" class="">relaxed</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="03915" class="">night</st>, <st data-num="0559" class="">thinking</st>,<n id="5" /> “He will not leave<n id="6" /> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> <st data-num="01242" class="">morning</st> <st data-num="0216" class="">comes</st>;<n id="7" /> then we will <st data-num="02026" class="">kill</st> him!”

Samson spent half the night with the prostitute; then he got up in the middle of the night and left. He grabbed the doors of the city gate, as well as the two posts, and pulled them right off, bar and all. He put them on his shoulders and carried them up to the top of a hill east of Hebron.
After this Samson fell in love with a woman named Delilah, who lived in the Sorek Valley.

The rulers of the Philistines went up to visit her and said to her, “Trick him! Find out what makes him so strong and how we can subdue him and humiliate him. Each one of us will give you 1,100 silver pieces.”
So Delilah said to Samson, “Tell me what makes you so strong and how you can be subdued and humiliated.”

<st data-num="08123" class="">Samson</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> her, “<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> they <st data-num="0631" class="">tie</st> me <st data-num="0631" class="">up</st> with <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="03892" class="">fresh</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03499" class="">bowstrings</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> have <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> been <st data-num="02717" class="">dried</st>, I will <st data-num="02470" class="">become weak</st> and <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> just like <st data-num="0259">any</st> other <st data-num="0120" class="">man</st>.”

So the <st data-num="05633" class="">rulers</st> of the <st data-num="06430" class="">Philistines</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">brought</st> her <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="03892" class="">fresh</st> <st data-num="03499" class="">bowstrings</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> had <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> been <st data-num="02717" class="">dried</st>, and she <st data-num="0631" class="">tied</st> him <st data-num="0631" class="">up</st> with them.

They hid in the bedroom and then she said to him, “The Philistines are here, Samson!” He snapped the bowstrings as easily as a thread of yarn snaps when it is put close to fire. The secret of his strength was not discovered.
Delilah said to Samson, “Look, you deceived me and told me lies! Now tell me how you can be subdued.”

He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> her, “<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> they <st data-num="0631" class="">tie</st> me <st data-num="0631" class="">tightly</st> with <st data-num="02319" class="">brand new</st> <st data-num="05688" class="">ropes</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> have <st data-num="03808" class="">never</st> been <st data-num="06213 04399">used</st>,<n id="1" /> I will <st data-num="02470" class="">become weak</st> and <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> just like <st data-num="0259">any</st> other <st data-num="0120" class="">man</st>.”

So Delilah took new ropes and tied him with them and said to him, “The Philistines are here, Samson!” (The Philistines were hiding in the bedroom.) But he tore the ropes from his arms as if they were a piece of thread.

Delilah said to Samson, “Up to now you have deceived me and told me lies. Tell me how you can be subdued.” He said to her, “If you weave the seven braids of my hair into the fabric on the loom and secure it with the pin, I will become weak and be like any other man.”

So she made him go to sleep, wove the seven braids of his hair into the fabric on the loom, fastened it with the pin, and said to him, “The Philistines are here, Samson!” He woke up and tore away the pin of the loom and the fabric.
She said to him, “How can you say, ‘I love you,’ when you will not share your secret with me? Three times you have deceived me and have not told me what makes you so strong.”

She <st data-num="01961 03588 06693 01697">nagged</st> him<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> and <st data-num="0509" class="">pressured</st> him until <st data-num="05315" class="">he</st> <st data-num="07114" class="">was sick</st> to <st data-num="04191" class="">death</st> of it.<n id="2" />

Finally he <st data-num="05046" class="">told</st> her his <st data-num="03605 03820">secret</st>.<n id="1" /> He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to her, “My <st data-num="07218" class="">hair</st> has <st data-num="03808" class="">never</st> been <st data-num="04177 05927 05921">cut</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> have been <st data-num="05139" class="">dedicated</st> to <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st><n id="3" /> from the time I was <st data-num="0990 0517">conceived</st>.<n id="4" /> <st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> my head<n id="5" /> were <st data-num="01548" class="">shaved</st>, my <st data-num="03581" class="">strength</st> would <st data-num="05493 04480">leave</st> me; I would <st data-num="02470">become weak</st> and <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> just like <st data-num="03605">all</st> other <st data-num="0120" class="">men</st>.”

When <st data-num="01807" class="">Delilah</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> he had <st data-num="05046" class="">told</st> her his <st data-num="03605 03820">secret</st>,<n id="1" /> she <st data-num="07971 07121">sent</st> for<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="05633" class="">rulers</st> of the <st data-num="06430" class="">Philistines</st>, <st data-num="0559" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="05927" class="">Come up</st> here <st data-num="06471" class="">again</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> he has <st data-num="05046" class="">told</st> me<n id="3" /> his <st data-num="03605 03820">secret</st>.”<n id="4" /> So the <st data-num="05633" class="">rulers</st> of the <st data-num="06430" class="">Philistines</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">went up</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> visit her, <st data-num="05927" class="">bringing</st> the <st data-num="03701" class="">silver</st> in their <st data-num="03027" class="">hands</st>.

She made him <st data-num="03462" class="">go to sleep</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> her <st data-num="01290" class="">lap</st><n id="1" /> and then <st data-num="07121" class="">called</st> a <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> in to <st data-num="01548" class="">shave off</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="04253" class="">braids</st> of his <st data-num="07218" class="">hair</st>.<n id="3" /> She <st data-num="02490" class="">made</st> him <st data-num="06031" class="">vulnerable</st><n id="4" /> and his <st data-num="03581" class="">strength</st> <st data-num="05493 05921">left</st> him.
She said, “The Philistines are here, Samson!” He woke up and thought, “I will do as I did before and shake myself free.” But he did not realize that the Lord had left him.

The <st data-num="06430" class="">Philistines</st> <st data-num="0270" class="">captured</st> him and <st data-num="05365" class="">gouged out</st> his <st data-num="05869" class="">eyes</st>. They <st data-num="03381" class="">brought</st> him <st data-num="03381" class="">down</st> to <st data-num="05804" class="">Gaza</st> and <st data-num="0631" class="">bound</st> him in <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st> chains. He <st data-num="01961" class="">became</st> a <st data-num="02912" class="">grinder</st> in the <st data-num="01004 0615">prison</st>.
His hair began to grow back after it had been shaved off.
The rulers of the Philistines gathered to offer a great sacrifice to Dagon their god and to celebrate. They said, “Our god has handed Samson, our enemy, over to us.”
When the people saw him, they praised their god, saying, “Our god has handed our enemy over to us, the one who ruined our land and killed so many of us!”
When they really started celebrating, they said, “Call for Samson so he can entertain us!” So they summoned Samson from the prison and he entertained them. They made him stand between two pillars.

<st data-num="08123" class="">Samson</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="05288" class="">young man</st> who <st data-num="02388" class="">held</st> his <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st>, “<st data-num="03240" class="">Position</st> me so I can <st data-num="03237" class="">touch</st> the <st data-num="05982" class="">pillars</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03559 05921">support</st> the <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st>.<n id="1" /> Then I can <st data-num="08172" class="">lean</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> them.”

Now the <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04390" class="">was filled with</st> <st data-num="0582" class="">men</st> and <st data-num="0802" class="">women</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05633" class="">rulers</st> of the <st data-num="06430" class="">Philistines</st> were <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st>. There were <st data-num="07969 0505" class="">3,000</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> and <st data-num="0802" class="">women</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="01406" class="">roof</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">watching</st> <st data-num="08123" class="">Samson</st> <st data-num="07832" class="">entertain</st>.
Samson called to the Lord, “O Sovereign Lord, remember me! Strengthen me just one more time, O God, so I can get swift revenge against the Philistines for my two eyes!”

<st data-num="08123" class="">Samson</st> <st data-num="03943" class="">took hold of</st> the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">middle</st> <st data-num="05982" class="">pillars</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03559 05921">supported</st> the <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st><n id="1" /> and he <st data-num="05564" class="">leaned</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> them, with his <st data-num="03225" class="">right hand</st> on <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> and his <st data-num="08040" class="">left hand</st> on the <st data-num="0259" class="">other</st>.

<st data-num="08123" class="">Samson</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “Let <st data-num="05315" class="">me</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="06430" class="">Philistines</st>!” He <st data-num="05186" class="">pushed</st> <st data-num="03581" class="">hard</st>,<n id="1" /> and the <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st> <st data-num="05307" class="">collapsed</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="05633" class="">rulers</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">and</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05971 0834">people</st> in it. He <st data-num="04191" class="">killed</st> <st data-num="07227" class="">many</st> more <st data-num="04191" class="">people</st> in his <st data-num="04194" class="">death</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">than</st> he had <st data-num="04191" class="">killed</st> during his <st data-num="02416" class="">life</st>.<n id="2" />
His brothers and all his family went down and brought him back. They buried him between Zorah and Eshtaol in the tomb of Manoah his father. He had led Israel for 20 years.
